summary: Completed comprehensive testing of The Bloomsbury Coven spiritual app. Backend APIs working excellently (94.4% success rate) with proper database seeding. Frontend UI loads with beautiful Rich Bloomsbury aesthetic, navigation works, and most features functional. Minor display issues found on Sacred Sites and Rituals pages.

flaky_endpoints.impact: AI chat feature may appear unresponsive to users
flaky_endpoints.note: API works but LLM responses are very slow

ui_bugs.issue: Displaying 0 site cards when backend has 5 sites
Only showing 1 ritual card when backend has 5 rituals

integration_issues.issue: No clear success/failure feedback after login/registration

passed_tests: Homepage loads with Rich Bloomsbury aesthetic
Navigation between all pages works correctly
Deities page: 4 deity cards display and modal functionality works
Historical Figures page: 5 figure cards display correctly
Timeline page: 12 timeline events display in chronological order
AI Chat UI: Message input and sending works
AI Image Generation: Prompt input and generation UI works
Authentication forms: Email/password inputs and buttons functional
Category filtering on Rituals page works
Backend APIs: 17/18 endpoints working (94.4% success rate)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix Sacred Sites page data display issue (0 cards showing despite 5 sites in backend). Investigate Rituals page showing only 1 card. Consider adding user feedback for authentication success/failure. AI Chat timeout is minor - works but slow.
